title: HOW DO I FIX IMGUR WHITE BOX PROBLEM
body: hi , everytime I upload imgur images I get the white box around my image/gif ... how do I fix this, I know its a quick thing, thank you!!!

replies.body:
Are there multiple images in the gallery?  It sounds like you're uploading the gallery for your image.  You should be able to resolve that by using the direct link to the image ending in .jpg or whatever it is.

With Frame (gallery link) -

http://imgur.com/gallery/QguRw

Without Frame - Direct image link

http://i.imgur.com/8OgoKIv.jpg

Hopefully, that should work.  If not, here's a cute piggy.  :p  

To the[ Boards Formating 101](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) post!
